resources.string:
ALL in One Theme



How to Install : https://plus.google.com/+JimmySetiawan84/posts/7FT5WbDyx4E



THIS THEME NEEDS THEME READY GOOGLE APPS! You MUST flash Theme Ready Google Apps Zip! : http://forum.xda-developers.com//android/apps-games/apps-themeable-hangouts-layers-cmte-t3113192/post60850740



More info and bug reports for this update : https://plus.google.com/+JimmySetiawan84

Ver 17.4

- Fix Hangouts 10 for Base Dark and Inverted Material


Ver 17.3

BASE DARK UPDATE!

- re-theme almost every apps to make it much better and up to date!

- add magpie fling icon

- add support for D-FUSE broken headers


Ver 17.2

- fix circle status bar


Ver 17.1

- fix latest theme ready G+ ( thanks to David Wilson )


Ver 17.0

INVERTED MATERIAL UPDATE!

- re-theme almost every apps to make it much better and up to date!

- add magpie fling icon

- add support for D-FUSE broken headers
